title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4815.17 - Temporary permit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4815.17 - Temporary permit

State Regulations

The commission may issue a temporary permit to an
applicant pending final action on the application. Any such temporary permit
shall be valid until withdrawn by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4815.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
